BiblioData.Title: ABRASIVE PARTICULATE MATERIAL, AND METHOD OF PLANARIZING A WORKPIECE USING THE ABRASIVE PARTICULATE MATERIAL
BiblioData.Abstract: An abrasive particulate material is disclosed that includes alumina particles. The alumina particles include a transition alumina and at least 5.0 wt % of an amorphous phase. The transition alumina particles also have a density not greater than about 3.20 g/cm<3>.

Claims.P: 1. An abrasive particulate material comprising:
alumina particles comprising transition alumina and at least 5.0 wt % of an amorphous phase, the alumina particles having a density not greater than about 3.20 g/cm<3> .
2. The abrasive particulate material of claim 1, wherein the transition alumina comprises at least one of gamma phase alumina and delta phase alumina.
3. The abrasive particulate material of claim 2, wherein the transition alumina comprises delta phase alumina.
4. The abrasive particulate material of claim 2, wherein the alumina particles comprise not less than about 20 wt % gamma phase alumina.
5. The abrasive particulate material of claim 1, wherein the transition alumina comprises theta phase alumina.
6. The abrasive particulate material of claim 5, wherein the alumina particles comprise not less than about 5 wt % theta phase alumina.
7-11. (canceled)

12. The abrasive particulate material of claim 1, wherein the alumina particles comprise not less than about 5.0 wt % amorphous phase and not greater than about 40 wt % amorphous phase, the balance of the particles consisting essentially of the transition alumina.
13. The abrasive particulate material of claim 1, wherein the alumina particles have a density not greater than about 3.00 g/cm<3> .
14. The abrasive particulate material of claim 13, wherein the alumina particles have a density not greater than about 2.95 g/cm<3> .
15-16. (canceled)
17. The abrasive particulate material of claim 1, wherein the alumina particles have a specific surface area not less than about 100 m<2> /g
18. The abrasive particulate material of claim 17, wherein the specific surface area is not less than about 125 m<2> /g.
19. The abrasive particulate material of claim 18, wherein the specific surface area is not less than about 150 m<2> /g.
20. The abrasive particulate material of claim 1, wherein the alumina particles comprise an elongated morphology.

21. The abrasive particulate material of claim 20, wherein the alumina particles are platelet-shaped, having a primary aspect ratio not less than about 3:1 and a secondary aspect ratio not less than about 3:1

22. The abrasive particulate material of claim 20, wherein the alumina particles are needle-shaped, having a primary aspect ratio not less than about 3:1 and a secondary aspect ratio not greater than about 3:1
23. The abrasive particulate material of claim 1, wherein the alumina particles have an average primary particle size not greater than about 85 nm.
24. The abrasive particulate material of claim 23, wherein the average primary particle size is not greater than about 40 nm.
25. (canceled)
26. The abrasive particulate material of claim 1, wherein the alumina particles have an average secondary particle size not greater than about 200 nm.
27. The abrasive particulate material of claim 26, wherein the average secondary particle size is not greater than about 150 nm.
28. (canceled)
29. The abrasive particulate material of claim 1, wherein the abrasive particulate material comprises a slurry.
30-34. (canceled)
35. The abrasive particulate material of claim 29, wherein the slurry has a colloidal stability as determined by a sedimentation height of about 0.0 mm after 3 days.
36. (canceled)
37. An abrasive particulate material comprising:
alumina particles comprising transition alumina and at least 5.0 wt % of an amorphous phase, wherein the transition alumina includes theta phase and at least one of gamma phase and delta phase.
38. The abrasive particulate material of claim 37, wherein the alumina particles comprise not less than about 20% gamma phase alumina.
39. The abrasive particulate material of claim 37, wherein the transition alumina comprises delta phase alumina.
40. (canceled)

41. The abrasive particulate material of claim 37, wherein a majority of the transition alumina comprises at least one of or a combination of gamma phase and delta phase, the alumina particles comprising 30 to 70 wt % of at least one of or a combination of gamma phase and delta phase, and 5 to 45 wt % theta phase.
42. The abrasive particulate material of claim 37, wherein the alumina particles comprise not less than about 10 wt % amorphous phase.
43-55. (canceled)
56. A method of forming an abrasive particulate material comprising:
providing feedstock particles containing principally transition alumina; and

milling the feedstock particles to form alumina particles comprising transition alumina and not less than about 5.0 wt % of an amorphous phase, the alumina particles having a density not greater than about 3.20 g/cm<3> .
57-85. (canceled)
